_header: Jesu of whom all true love springs
Subjects: love, toward Jesus; Christ, love towards
_description: A prayer of love to Jesus — one 8-line stanza (ababcbcb)

Lincoln91.First Lines:
Ihesu if whayme all trewe luffe spryngesThat for my lufe tholede
                    payne…
Lincoln91.Last Lines:
…And for thy lufe to make mournyngeThat for my lufe walde be
                    slayneAmen Amen Amen Amen par charite
Lincoln91.Note: Immediately follows 2909, as if part of same work.
